title: GPT-4 has arrived. Here’s what to expect from the new AI.
description: GPT-4 is designed to be safer and better at solving difficult problems, according to its creator.

title: GPT-4 has arrived. It will blow ChatGPT out of the water
description: The language AI tool is expected to push the technical and ethical boundaries of a fast-advancing AI that mimics human speech.

title: Hotel WiFi can be terrible. Here are four tips to deal with it.
description: We don’t put up with balky hotel plumbing, and we shouldn’t accept unreliable WiFi, either.

title: Silicon Valley, once the underdog, is now too big to fail
description: The government stepped in to save the venture capital industry from itself. Not everyone is relieved.

title: Snapchat tried to make a safe AI. It chats with me about booze and sex.
description: In conversations with our tech columnist, Snapchat’s experimental chatbot offered advice on hiding alcohol and marijuana, defeating parental phone controls and cheating on homework.

title: Google is adding AI to its work apps. Here’s what that means.
description: Google Workspace, including Google Docs, Sheets and Gmail, will soon include generative AI tools that aim to aid with work.
